Item Text: AWS Partner Funding Portal (APFP)
Tooltip: Primary portal for fund requests and claims. Log in with your partner credentials to submit funding requests and track claim status.

Item Text: MAP Terms & Conditions
Tooltip: Official program terms and conditions. Review these to understand your obligations and rights under the MAP program.

Item Text: Migration Readiness Assessment Guide
Tooltip: Complete documentation for conducting the Migration Readiness Assessment. Required for MAP projects over $500K ARR.

Item Text: MAP Included Services List
Tooltip: List of AWS services eligible for MAP funding. Ensure your migration uses approved services to qualify for credits.

Item Text: AWS Pricing Calculator
Tooltip: Calculate your anticipated post-migration ARR. This must match the ARR value in your fund request.

Item Text: Determine migration eligibility for MAP funding
Tooltip: Verify that your migration project meets AWS MAP requirements:

Phase ID: - Minimum ARR thresholds ($100K for MAP Lite, $500K for MAP)

Item Text: Confirm partner eligibility requirements are met

Phase ID: - Select AWS Use Case and Workload Competencies OR
Check the AWS Partner Funding Benefits Guide for complete list

Item Text: Identify customer's anticipated post-migration Annual Run Rate (ARR)
Tooltip: Calculate expected AWS spend after migration completion:

Phase ID: - Use AWS Pricing Calculator for accuracy
- This determines MAP vs MAP Lite eligibility
- Must be documented for fund request

Item Text: Select appropriate MAP type based on ARR

Phase ID: - MAP Lite: $100K - <$500K ARR (simpler process, single payment)
This decision affects all subsequent requirements

Item Text: Complete Migration Readiness Assessment (MRA)
Tooltip: The MRA evaluates your organization's readiness across:

Phase ID: - People: Skills, roles, and organizational readiness
⚠️ MUST be completed before receiving any MAP Credits

Item Text: Determine if project qualifies for Strategic Partner Incentives (SPI)
Tooltip: SPI provides additional funding up to 10% of ARR (max $100K) for:

Phase ID: Check eligibility criteria in Partner Central

Item Text: Obtain customer consent for MAP migration tagging

Phase ID: - Implement MAP tags on all migrated workloads
- Allow AWS to track tagged resources
- Understand this is required for payment processing
⚠️ Without proper tagging, payments may be delayed or denied

Item Text: Obtain valid AWS Management Account ID

Phase ID: Ensure this is the customer's primary AWS account

Item Text: Assess if AWS Modernization Pathways attribute to at least 40% of anticipated post-launch ARR
Tooltip: For modernization incentives, verify that qualifying services represent 40%+ of ARR:

Item Text: Access AWS Partner Funding Portal (APFP)
Tooltip: Log into APFP with your partner credentials:

Phase ID: - Navigate to Migration Acceleration Program section
- Have all required information ready before starting

Item Text: Choose migration phase (Assess or Mobilize)

Phase ID: - Mobilize: Detailed planning and preparation for migration
Each phase has different funding limits and requirements

Item Text: Enter ARR value

Phase ID: - Must match AWS Pricing Calculator output exactly
- Include all AWS services in scope
- Do not include one-time migration costs
⚠️ Mismatched ARR values will cause delays

Item Text: Create AWS Pricing Calculator link with all AWS services in the solution

Phase ID: - Include ALL services that will be used post-migration
- Save and share the calculator link
- This link must be submitted with fund request
- Keep calculator updated if scope changes

Item Text: Complete MAP Partner Scope Checklist
Tooltip: Download the official template from Partner Central:

Phase ID: - Indicate resources and effort in days (1 day = 8 hours)
⚠️ Do not modify the template structure

Item Text: Prepare business case documentation

Phase ID: - Future state on AWS with benefits

Item Text: AWS Partner self-assessment for Greenfield account status
Tooltip: Determine if customer qualifies as Greenfield:

Phase ID: - No prior AWS usage or minimal usage

Item Text: Complete modernization pathways assessment
Tooltip: Document which modernization paths will be used:

Phase ID: - Calculate percentage of ARR from modern services

Item Text: Confirm understanding of MAP tagging requirements
Upload Migration Assessment Report (if VMware)
Develop Initial Business Case
Conduct Initial Discovery
Complete Strategy Analysis (7Rs)
Document all findings and recommendations
Update scope checklist with actual completed workstreams
Confirm participation of Solutions Architect and Project Manager

Phase ID: - Document in scope checklist if not participating

Item Text: Develop Detailed Business Case
Tooltip: Expand on initial business case with:

Item Text: Conduct Detailed Discovery
Establish Planning and Governance
Implement Security and Compliance framework
Design Operating Model
Address People: skills, culture, change, and leadership

Phase ID: - Skills gap analysis and training plans

Item Text: Create Migration and Modernization Experience
Execute Custom workstreams (if applicable)

Phase ID: - Document all custom work in notes

Item Text: Track project start and end dates

Phase ID: - Update end date if changes occur

Item Text: Document any scope changes or dropped deliverables
Implement MAP tagging for migrations
Complete Landing Zone workstream (if necessary)
Execute migration according to approved scope
Track and document migration progress
Apply MAP tags to migrated workloads
Monitor $50K cumulative revenue milestone
Monitor 20% of ARR cumulative revenue (if funding >$400K)
Tooltip: For large projects, track second milestone:

Item Text: Track VM migrations for per-VM cash payout
Prepare VM migration report
Download MAP Customer Sign-off Template
Complete scope and project deliverables section

Phase ID: - Project name and fund request ID

Item Text: Mark all completed workstreams
Tooltip: Check boxes for all completed work:

Phase ID: - Include workstreams done in different phases
- Example: Assess work done during Mobilize

Item Text: Add notes for any scope variations
Complete partner acknowledgment checkbox
Include total AWS pre-approved funding amount
Send sign-off template to customer for review

Phase ID: - Offer to review together if needed

Item Text: Customer reviews scope and deliverables
Customer completes acknowledgment checkboxes
Obtain authorized signature
Collect signed customer sign-off with proper authentication
Customer confirms FULL migration completion

Phase ID: - Customer MUST confirm entire migration is done
⚠️ This is the #1 reason for MAP Lite claim rejection

Item Text: Customer confirms project contains Modernization Pathways

Phase ID: - Only required if claiming SPI for modernization

Item Text: Access AWS Partner Funding Portal (APFP)
Upload completed and signed MAP Customer Sign-off Template
Include Certificate of Completion (for electronic signatures)
Include audit trail for electronic signatures
Submit invoice according to milestone achieved
Submit single payment claim after customer sign-off
Submit first claim with customer sign-off
Submit second claim with VM migration report
Submit single milestone payment claim at $50K cumulative revenue
Submit first milestone claim: $400K at $50K cumulative revenue
Submit second milestone claim at 20% of ARR cumulative revenue
Ensure all MAP tagging is properly implemented and validated
Monitor claim status in APFP
Address any claim processing issues
Request customer rating on AWS Partner Solutions Finder

Phase ID: - Make it easy with direct link

Item Text: Receive payment per approved purchase order
Document lessons learned for future MAP projects
